item.title: python profiling and optimize
item.description: profiling python {% codeblock “commandline profiling” %} python -m cProfile -s tottime your_program.py {% endcodeblock %} 优化 np random 比原生函数快四倍 {% asset_img np1.png %} {% asset_img np2.png %} 需要记住的延迟数据 {% codeblock %} Latency Comparison Numbers L1 cache reference 0.5 ns Branch mispredict 5 ns L2 cache reference 7 ns 14x L1 cache Mutex lock/unlock
